verses.verse: אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish He תּ֭וֹכָחוֹת <S%H8433><s%> To-cha-chot that being often reproved מַקְשֶׁה־ <S%H7185><s%> mak-sheh- hardeneth עֹ֑רֶף <S%H6203><s%> 'O-ref; [his] neck פֶּ֥תַע <S%H6621><s%> Pe-ta' shall suddenly יִ֝שָּׁבֵ֗ר <S%H7665><s%> yish-sha-Ver, be destroyed וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein beyond מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <S%H4832><s%> mar-Pe. and that without remedy

בִּרְב֣וֹת <S%H7235><s%> bir-Vot are in authority צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> Tzad-di-kim When the righteous יִשְׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach rejoice הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; the people וּבִמְשֹׁ֥ל <S%H4910><s%> u-vim-Shol beareth rule רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha', but when the wicked יֵאָ֥נַֽח <S%H584><s%> ye-'A-nach mourn עָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'Am. the people

אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- Whoso אֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> 'o-Hev loveth חָ֭כְמָה <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah wisdom יְשַׂמַּ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> ye-sam-Mach rejoiceth אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; his father וְרֹעֶ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> ve-ro-'Eh but he that keepeth company ז֝וֹנ֗וֹת <S%H2181><s%> zo-Not, with harlots יְאַבֶּד־ <S%H6><s%> ye-'ab-bed- spendeth הֽוֹן׃ <S%H1952><s%> Hon. [his] substance

מֶ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech, The king בְּ֭מִשְׁפָּט <S%H4941><s%> Be-mish-pot by judgment יַעֲמִ֣יד <S%H5975><s%> ya-'a-Mid establisheth אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; the land וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish but he תְּרוּמ֣וֹת <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-Mot that receiveth gifts יֶֽהֶרְסֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H2040><s%> Ye-her-Sen-nah. overthroweth

גֶּ֭בֶר <S%H1397><s%> Ge-ver A man מַחֲלִ֣יק <S%H2505><s%> ma-cha-Lik that flattereth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu; his neighbour רֶ֝֗שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> Re-shet, a net פּוֹרֵ֥שׂ <S%H6566><s%> po-Res spreadeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for פְּעָמָֽיו׃ <S%H6471><s%> pe-'a-Mav. for his feet

בְּפֶ֤שַֽׁע <S%H6588><s%> be-Fe-sha' In the transgression אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man רָ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> ra' of an evil מוֹקֵ֑שׁ <S%H4170><s%> mo-Kesh; [there is] a snare וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> ve-tzad-Dik, but the righteous יָר֥וּן <S%H7442><s%> ya-Run doth sing וְשָׂמֵֽחַ׃ <S%H8055><s%> ve-sa-Me-ach. and rejoices

יֹדֵ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> yo-De-a' considereth צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> Tzad-dik The righteous דִּ֣ין <S%H1779><s%> din the cause דַּלִּ֑ים <S%H1800><s%> dal-Lim; of the poor רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha', [but] the wicked לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- does not יָבִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> ya-Vin regardeth דָּֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> Da-'at. not to know

אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei he לָ֭צוֹן <S%H3944><s%> La-tzon Scornful יָפִ֣יחוּ <S%H6315><s%> ya-Fi-chu into a snare קִרְיָ֑ה <S%H7151><s%> kir-Yah; a city וַ֝חֲכָמִ֗ים <S%H2450><s%> va-cha-cha-Mim, but wise יָשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shi-vu [men] turn away אָֽף׃ <S%H639><s%> 'Af. wrath

אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- man חָכָ֗ם <S%H2450><s%> cha-Cham, [If] a wise נִ֭שְׁפָּט <S%H8199><s%> Nish-pot contendeth אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man אֱוִ֑יל <S%H191><s%> 'e-Vil; with a foolish וְרָגַ֥ז <S%H7264><s%> ve-ra-Gaz whether he rage וְ֝שָׂחַ֗ק <S%H7832><s%> ve-sa-Chak, or laugh וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and there נָֽחַת׃ <S%H5183><s%> Na-chat. [there is] no rest

אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> 'an-Shei another דָ֭מִים <S%H1818><s%> Da-mim of bloodshed יִשְׂנְאוּ־ <S%H8130><s%> yis-ne-'u- hate תָ֑ם <S%H8535><s%> Tam; the upright וִֽ֝ישָׁרִ֗ים <S%H3477><s%> vi-sha-Rim, but the just יְבַקְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1245><s%> ye-vak-Shu seek נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho. his soul

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner ר֭וּחוֹ <S%H7307><s%> ru-cho all his mind יוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tzi uttereth כְסִ֑יל <S%H3684><s%> che-Sil; A fool וְ֝חָכָ֗ם <S%H2450><s%> ve-cha-Cham, but a wise בְּאָח֥וֹר <S%H268><s%> be-'a-Chor it in till afterwards יְשַׁבְּחֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7623><s%> ye-shab-be-Chen-nah. [man] keepeth

מֹ֭שֵׁל <S%H4910><s%> Mo-shel If a ruler מַקְשִׁ֣יב <S%H7181><s%> mak-Shiv hearken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- act שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> Sha-ker; to falsehood כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- All מְשָׁרְתָ֥יו <S%H8334><s%> me-sha-re-Tav all his servants רְשָׁעִֽים׃ <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im. [are] wicked

רָ֤שׁ <S%H7326><s%> rash The poor וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish man תְּכָכִ֣ים <S%H8501><s%> te-cha-Chim and the deceitful נִפְגָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H6298><s%> nif-Ga-shu; meet together מֵ֤אִיר־ <S%H215><s%> Me-'ir- lighteneth עֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei their eyes שְׁנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem both יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king שׁוֹפֵ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> sho-Fet judgeth בֶּֽאֱמֶ֣ת <S%H571><s%> be-'e-Met that faithfully דַּלִּ֑ים <S%H1800><s%> dal-Lim; the poor כִּ֝סְא֗וֹ <S%H3678><s%> kis-'O, his throne לָעַ֥ד <S%H5703><s%> la-'Ad for ever יִכּֽוֹן׃ <S%H3559><s%> yik-Kon. shall be established

שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet The rod וְ֭תוֹכַחַת <S%H8433><s%> Ve-to-cha-chat and reproof יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten give חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah wisdom וְנַ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> ve-Na-'ar but a child מְ֝שֻׁלָּ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> me-shul-Lach, left מֵבִ֥ישׁ <S%H954><s%> me-Vish to shame אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo. [to himself] bringeth his mother

בִּרְב֣וֹת <S%H7235><s%> bir-Vot are multiplied רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> Re-sha-'im When the wicked יִרְבֶּה־ <S%H7235><s%> yir-beh- increaseth פָּ֑שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> Pa-sha'; transgression וְ֝צַדִּיקִ֗ים <S%H6662><s%> ve-tzad-di-Kim, but the righteous בְּֽמַפַּלְתָּ֥ם <S%H4658><s%> be-map-pal-Tam their fall יִרְאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'U. shall see

יַסֵּ֣ר <S%H3256><s%> yas-Ser Correct בִּ֭נְךָ <S%H1121><s%> Bin-cha thy son וִֽינִיחֶ֑ךָ <S%H5117><s%> vi-ni-Che-cha; and he shall give thee rest וְיִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-yit-Ten yea he shall give מַעֲדַנִּ֣ים <S%H4574><s%> ma-'a-dan-Nim delight לְנַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> le-naf-She-cha. unto thy soul פ Peh

בְּאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> be-'Ein there חָ֭זוֹן <S%H2377><s%> Cha-zon Where [there is] no vision יִפָּ֣רַֽע <S%H6544><s%> yip-Pa-ra' perish עָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> 'Am; the people וְשֹׁמֵ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> ve-sho-Mer but he that keepeth תּוֹרָ֣ה <S%H8451><s%> to-Rah the law אַשְׁרֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Re-hu. happy

בִּ֭דְבָרִים <S%H1697><s%> Bid-va-rim by words לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יִוָּ֣סֶר <S%H3256><s%> yiv-Va-ser will not be corrected עָ֑בֶד <S%H5650><s%> 'A-ved; A servant כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יָ֝בִ֗ין <S%H995><s%> ya-Vin, for though he understand וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein there מַעֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4617><s%> ma-'a-Neh. he will not answer

חָזִ֗יתָ <S%H2372><s%> cha-Zi-ta, Seest אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish thou a man אָ֣ץ <S%H213><s%> 'atz [that is] hasty בִּדְבָרָ֑יו <S%H1697><s%> bid-va-Rav; act תִּקְוָ֖ה <S%H8615><s%> tik-Vah hope לִכְסִ֣יל <S%H3684><s%> lich-Sil of a fool מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu. than

מְפַנֵּ֣ק <S%H6445><s%> me-fan-Nek He that delicately bringeth up מִנֹּ֣עַר <S%H5290><s%> min-No-'ar from a child עַבְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5650><s%> av-Do; his servant וְ֝אַחֲרִית֗וֹ <S%H319><s%> ve-'a-cha-ri-To, at the length יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh to be a מָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H4497><s%> ma-Non. shall have him become [his] son

אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- man אַ֭ף <S%H639><s%> 'af An angry יְגָרֶ֣ה <S%H1624><s%> ye-ga-Reh stirreth up מָד֑וֹן <S%H4066><s%> ma-Don; strife וּבַ֖עַל <S%H1167><s%> u-Va-'al man חֵמָ֣ה <S%H2534><s%> che-Mah and a furious רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- aboundeth in פָּֽשַׁע׃ <S%H6588><s%> Pa-sha'. transgression

גַּאֲוַ֣ת <S%H1346><s%> ga-'a-Vat pride אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> 'A-dom A man's תַּשְׁפִּילֶ֑נּוּ <S%H8213><s%> tash-pi-Len-nu; shall bring him low וּשְׁפַל־ <S%H8217><s%> u-she-fal- the humble ר֝֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach, in spirit יִתְמֹ֥ךְ <S%H8551><s%> yit-Moch shall uphold כָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> ka-Vod. but honour

חוֹלֵ֣ק <S%H2505><s%> cho-Lek Whoso is partner עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with גַּ֭נָּב <S%H1590><s%> gan-no with a thief שׂוֹנֵ֣א <S%H8130><s%> so-Ne hateth נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho; his own soul אָלָ֥ה <S%H423><s%> 'a-Lah cursing יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> yish-Ma', he heareth וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nothing יַגִּֽיד׃ <S%H5046><s%> yag-Gid. and bewrayeth

רַ֭בִּים <S%H7227><s%> Rab-bim Many מְבַקְשִׁ֣ים <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Shim seek פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei- favour מוֹשֵׁ֑ל <S%H4910><s%> mo-Shel; the ruler's וּ֝מֵיְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [cometh] from the LORD מִשְׁפַּט־ <S%H4941><s%> mish-pat- judgment אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish. but [every] man's
